title: Mushroom Tree Glass Bowl—Coral
description:
Make waves with the lush aqua and coral ripples of this handcrafted bowl. Both functional and beautiful, the bowl achieves it's solid state when liquid glass is poured into a spinning steel mold, which rotates to create its shape. Each piece is handmade and hand-painted in Turkey, no two are alike. 

14 1/2 in. diam. x 3 1/2 in. high
